concept.title: Release 11.5.0
concept.shortdesc: Release 11.5.0 includes the following new features.

ul.li: Support for 11.5.0 Meetings - Version 11.5.0 of the HCL Sametime mobile client is required to join meetings hosted by an HCL Sametime 11.5.0 server.
New My Meetings tab - The Meetings dialog will contain a My Meetings tab when connected to an 11.5.0 server. The user can manage their personal meetings under this new tab.
